# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G. Victores 2014

set(KEYWORD "ImageLib")

find_package(YARP REQUIRED)
find_package(ZBar REQUIRED)

add_library(${KEYWORD} ImageEventListener.hpp
                       ImageManager.hpp
                       ImageManager.cpp
                       MockImageEventListener.hpp
                       MockImageEventListener.cpp
                       MockImageManager.hpp
                       MockImageManager.cpp
                       ProcessorImageEventListener.hpp
                       ProcessorImageEventListener.cpp
                       YarpImageManager.hpp
                       YarpImageManager.cpp
                       YarpLocalImageManager.hpp
                       YarpLocalImageManager.cpp)

target_include_directories(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
                                             ${ZBAR_INCLUDE_DIR})

target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC YARP::YARP_OS
                                        YARP::YARP_dev
                                        YARP::YARP_sig
                                        ${ZBAR_LIBRARIES}
                                        MentalMapLib)

target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} PRIVATE YARP::YARP_init
                                         UtilsLib)
